Issues.Title: Fixing indeterminate image color
Issues.Body:
<!-- Please read CONTRIBUTING.md before submitting a pull request -->

Fixes #9166 


## Proposed changes

- Add HighContrast judgment when drawing indeterminate image in file ToolStripRenderer.cs
- When the item is selected or under HC black theme, revert the image color

<!-- We are in TELL-MODE the following section must be completed -->

## Customer Impact

- The color contrast of indeterminate state icon can be showed clearly

## Regression? 

-  No

## Risk

- Minimal

<!-- end TELL-MODE -->


## Screenshots <!-- Remove this section if PR does not change UI -->

### Before
**Windows 11 non-focused:**
![image](https://github.com/dotnet/winforms/assets/132890443/7431f34e-95e4-42d8-b9e9-6abb5e4a4597)

**Windows 11 mouse over:**
![image](https://github.com/dotnet/winforms/assets/132890443/83ff5a06-ffec-4e61-9e06-bcaf0fdadd14)

### After
![image](https://github.com/dotnet/winforms/assets/132890443/e133d8a0-839b-4d64-adb9-637ab605af92)


## Test methodology <!-- How did you ensure quality? -->

- Manually

## Test environment(s) <!-- Remove any that don't apply -->

- .net 8.0.0-rc.1.23409.17


<!-- Mention language, UI scaling, or anything else that might be relevant -->


###### Microsoft Reviewers: [Open in CodeFlow](https://portal.fabricbot.ms/api/codeflow?pullrequest=https://github.com/dotnet/winforms/pull/9710)

Issues.Title: Add "SetTextualDefaultProperty = false" for MaskedTextBox
Issues.Body:
<!-- Please read CONTRIBUTING.md before submitting a pull request -->

Related #4908 


## Proposed changes

- Add "SetTextualDefaultProperty = false" for MaskedTextBoxDesigner
- Add test for MaskedTextBoxDesigner in DemoConsole project

<!-- We are in TELL-MODE the following section must be completed -->

## Customer Impact

- The default mask value will be null

## Regression? 

-  No

## Risk

- Minimal

<!-- end TELL-MODE -->


## Screenshots <!-- Remove this section if PR does not change UI -->

### Before
The default Mask value of the MaskedTextBox is M_skedTextBox1
![image](https://github.com/dotnet/winforms/assets/132890443/921ffc21-58e4-460d-a04a-d1aba698022f)


### After

The default Mask value is null

![image](https://github.com/dotnet/winforms/assets/132890443/e5eb8dee-d2c4-4b39-ae87-e587658a8534)


## Test methodology <!-- How did you ensure quality? -->

- Manually (added TrackBarDesigner to DemoConsole test app)


## Test environment(s) <!-- Remove any that don't apply -->

- .net 8.0.0-rc.1.23409.17


<!-- Mention language, UI scaling, or anything else that might be relevant -->

Issues.Title: Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 164: Build ID 2241522
Issues.Body:
This is the pull request automatically created by the OneLocBuild task in the build process to check-in localized files generated based upon translation source files (.lcl files) handed-back from the downstream localization pipeline. If there are issues in translations, visit https://aka.ms/icxLocBug and log bugs for fixes. The OneLocBuild wiki is https://aka.ms/onelocbuild and the localization process in general is documented at https://aka.ms/AllAboutLoc.

Issues.Title: Issus 4908 port save file dialog designer and folder browser dialog designer
Issues.Body:
<!-- Please read CONTRIBUTING.md before submitting a pull request -->

Related #4908 


## Proposed changes

- Port SaveFileDialogDesigner and FolderBrowserDialogDesigner to runtime

<!-- We are in TELL-MODE the following section must be completed -->

## Customer Impact

- SaveFileDialogDesigner and FolderBrowserDialogDesigner can be designed in runtime

## Regression?

## Risk

- Minimal

Issues.Title: Random Fatal error causing test failure
Issues.Body:
Random exception in test run:
https://github.com/dotnet/winforms/pull/9681#issuecomment-1671816173

```
System.Windows.Forms.Tests.AxHostVisualBasic6Tests.AxHost_SimpleControl_Create [SKIP]
Causes test run to abort, must be run manually.
Fatal error. 0xC0000005
at System.StubHelpers.InterfaceMarshaler.ConvertToManaged(IntPtr ByRef, IntPtr, IntPtr, Int32)
at Interop+Mshtml+IHTMLDocument2.GetLocation()
at System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser.get_Document()
at System.Windows.Forms.Tests.HtmlElementTests+d__129.MoveNext()

at System.Runtime.CompilerServices.AsyncTaskMethodBuilder1+AsyncStateMachineBox1[[System.__Canon, System.Private.CoreLib, Version=8.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=7cec85d7bea7798e],[System.Windows.Forms.Tests.HtmlElementTests+d__129, System.Windows.Forms.Tests, Version=8.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b77a5c561934e089]].MoveNext()
at System.Threading.Tasks.SynchronizationContextAwaitTaskContinuation+<>c.<.cctor>b__8_0(System.Object)
at DynamicClass.InvokeStub_SendOrPostCallback.Invoke(System.Object, System.Span`1<System.Object>)
at System.Reflection.MethodBaseInvoker.InvokeWithOneArg(System.Object, System.Reflection.BindingFlags, System.Reflection.Binder, System.Object[], System.Globalization.CultureInfo)
at System.Reflection.RuntimeMethodInfo.Invoke(System.Object, System.Reflection.BindingFlags, System.Reflection.Binder, System.Object[], System.Globalization.CultureInfo)
at System.Windows.Forms.Control.InvokeMarshaledCallbackDo(ThreadMethodEntry)
at System.Windows.Forms.Control.InvokeMarshaledCallbackHelper(System.Object)
```

Issues.Title: [GB18030] The print preview does not display correctly when the input text is GB18030 characters.
Issues.Body:
### .NET version

.NET SDK 8.0.100-rc.1.23402.12

### Did it work in .NET Framework?

No

### Did it work in any of the earlier releases of .NET Core or .NET 5+?

No, it also repro on .NET6.0 & 7.0.

### Issue description

The print preview does not display correctly when the input text is Dehong Dai(eg: ᥘᥣᥭᥰᥖᥭᥰᥖᥬᥲᥑᥨᥒᥰ) and Xishuangbanna Dai(eg: ᦎᦷᦑᦺᦖᦺᧈᦉᦲᧇᦉᦸᧂᦗᧃᦓᦱ) 

![image](https://github.com/dotnet/winforms/assets/108860782/06ca58a8-af1e-44dd-ac60-53cdacb8f764)

![image](https://github.com/dotnet/winforms/assets/108860782/d28857a2-0f1a-4145-9637-e0ba589f4fd8)

![image](https://github.com/dotnet/winforms/assets/108860782/c2064d54-4e4e-44cc-8657-24d167cf8452)



### Steps to reproduce

1. Unzip the folder [TestAPP.zip](https://github.com/dotnet/winforms/files/12300135/TestAPP.zip)
2. Build and run this project. 
3. In the textbox, input **ᥘᥣᥭᥰ ᥖᥭᥰ ᥖᥬᥲᥑᥨᥒᥰ** or **ᦷᦎᦺᦑᦺᦖᧈᦉᦲᧇᦉᦸᧂᦗᧃᦓᦱ** 
4. Click on the preview button and observe
Issues.RelatedDescription: Open issue "[GB18030] The print preview does not display correctly when the input text is GB18030 characters. " (#9693)

Issues.Title: Missing System.Drawing.Common NuGet package for .NET 8 Preview 6 and newer.
Issues.Body:
### .NET version

.NET 8 Preview 6 and newer.

### Did it work in .NET Framework?

Not tested/verified

### Did it work in any of the earlier releases of .NET Core or .NET 5+?

Last available NuGet package is targeting .NET 8 Preview 5

### Issue description

There haven't been any new preview packages for System.Draing.Common since .NET 8 preview 5: https://www.nuget.org/packages/System.Drawing.Common/8.0.0-preview.5.23280.5

Is this simply an oversight or is the package effectively deprecated? Related to the migration from runtime to winforms?

### Steps to reproduce

N/A
Issues.RelatedDescription: Closed issue "Missing System.Drawing.Common NuGet package for .NET 8 Preview 6 and newer." (#9689)
